description: This file defines a React component for a customizable alert dialog using Radix UI primitives. It includes various subcomponents such as overlay, content, header, footer, title, description, action, and cancel button, all styled with utility functions and class names.

methods.name: React.forwardRef
methods.description: Creates React components with forwarded refs for overlay, content, title, description, action, and cancel button.

methods.name: React.HTMLAttributes
methods.description: Type for HTML attributes for div elements used in header and footer components.
